description: Message displayed while action of pinning an item is being processed by the server. Same as defining an item as the main item
A message that informs the user a 'pin' action is finished and a redirect is about to happen
defaultMessage: Done, redirecting to new main item…

description: Banner displayed after items are detached successfully
Menu option for pinning an item as the main item
Label for a button that lets the user set the media item they are clicking to be _not_ matched to its parent media item.
Shows the last time a media was submitted
Header of requests list. Example: 26 requests
